alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Platte County; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 3:03PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Laramie and southeastern Platte Counties through 400 PM MDT... At 303 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southwest of Chugwater, or 26 miles south of Wheatland, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Chugwater. This includes Interstate 25 in Wyoming between mile markers 31 and 57. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Platte County; South Laramie Range Foothills
